name: The Art of Budgeting
description: When Kaveh, who has this card equipped, is on the field, and after you trigger Burst Scan's effects: Add 1 copy of the Discarded card into your Hand. If this card is a Location Card, then the next Location Card you play this Round will cost 2 less Elemental Dice. (Once per Round)
descriptionraw: When $[A1708], who has this card equipped, is on the field, and after you trigger <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C117082]</color>'s effects: Add 1 copy of the $[K56]ed card into your Hand. If this card is a {SPRITE_PRESET#3104}Location Card, then the next {SPRITE_PRESET#3104}Location Card you play this Round will cost 2 less Elemental Dice. (Once per Round)
descriptionreplaced: When Kaveh, who has this card equipped, is on the field, and after you trigger <color=#FFFFFFFF>Burst Scan</color>'s effects: Add 1 copy of the <color=#FFFFFFFF>Discard</color>ed card into your Hand. If this card is a {SPRITE_PRESET#3104}Location Card, then the next {SPRITE_PRESET#3104}Location Card you play this Round will cost 2 less Elemental Dice. (Once per Round)
